Poland Quiz
//Questions What do you know about Poland? Which city is capital of Poland? Which dishes are most popular in Poland? (3 correct answers) Which religion is most popular in Poland? In which part of Poland you can see bison? Which witch countries Poland has borders? What is Polonez? How does the Polish flag looks like? Who was Karol Wojtyła?
//Answers Staffed dumplings Pasta Pork chop with mash potatoes Fish and chips Pancakes Cabbage with sausage
Islam Christianity Judaism
Białowieża National Park Bieszczady Mountains Ojców National Park Wolin National Park
Spain, Greece, France, Portugal China, Iraq, Turkey, Yemen Chech Republic, Slovakia, Ukraine, Germany, Russia, Lithuania, Belarus Finland, Russia, Estonia
